Class GamePlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • GamePlay

  • public class GamePlay
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for tne main functions and algorithms of the game such as restart, botGameplay, autoplay, logging last game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GamePlay() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void autoPlay()
      This method allow computer to play one game itself, and creates the log file with the information of all actions of the computer while it was playing.
      static void botGameplay()
      This method contains the algorithm for computer (bot) for playing the game without second player.
      static void javaSort() 
      static void loadGame() 
      static void notationTransform() 
      static void restart()
      This method restarts or close app (if we don't need to restart game).
      static void restartWithoutConfirm()
      This method restarts the game without confirmation
      static void scalaSort() 
      static void scalaStatistic() 
      static void writeLog(int rand, java.lang.String str)
      Method for write log from the autoplay mode.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • autoPlay

        public static void autoPlay()
        This method allow computer to play one game itself, and creates the log file with the information of all actions of the computer while it was playing.

      • restart

        public static void restart()
        This method restarts or close app (if we don't need to restart game).

      • restartWithoutConfirm

        public static void restartWithoutConfirm()
        This method restarts the game without confirmation

      • botGameplay

        public static void botGameplay()
        This method contains the algorithm for computer (bot) for playing the game without second player.

      • writeLog

        public static void writeLog(int rand,
                            java.lang.String str)
        Method for write log from the autoplay mode.
        Parameters:
        rand - the number of the button which was randomly choosen in autoplay method
        str - the text we set this button (may be "X" or "O")
